numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The graph depicts components that affect the likelihood of acceptance into an elite college.
3. A legacy with an income in the 0.1 percentile is seven times more likely to be accepted into an elite college than a non-legacy.
4. The graph shows that legacy plays a role in the college admissions process.
5. The graph shows that income plays a role in the college admissions process.
6. I wonder if universities use income in admissions so that universities do not have to grant financial aid to students who need financial aid.
7. This situation applies to my community.
8. I am a senior in the college admissions process.
9. I do not have a legacy.
